I am a computational neuroscientist at the Charles University in Prague. During my bachelor studies of mathematics, I got intriguied by the idea to apply mathematical methods in biology which always attracted me. This interest then lead me via evolutionary game theory, mathematical epidemiology and ecological population models all the way to neuroscience.
In my research I try to learn about cortical function from its spontaneous activity and understand how the cortex communicates with the hippocampus.
